DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 first-in-human single ascending dose study will be a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled investigation of the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of PF-06741086.
DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study of PF-06741086 In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs) and 100 kg (220 lbs). Increased risk of thrombosis (coronary artery disease, hypercholesterolemia, diabetes) Use of nicotine/tobacco products Clotting disorders
